column1: Every night, the animals gathered around Oliver, eager to hear his stories about the world beyond the forest.
column2: Deep in the ocean, where the water is as blue as the sky a family of dolphins played.
column3: She watered it every day and watched it grow.
column4: Deep in the heart of the jungle there lived a curious monkey named Momo.
column5: Every morning inviting everyone in for a warm tasty breakfast.
column6: Tim ran after the rat but it was too fast. Tim came back to the mat and took a nap.
column7: Cobwebs hung from the ceiling and the wind howled outside.
column8: They leaped out of the water, performing flips and spins.
column9: Sam jumps over puddles and laughs with joy.
column10: They taught Alex their unique language and shared stories.
